name: WP API (V2) isFront
author: Oleg Kostin

sections.description: This plugin extends the WordPress JSON REST API with new endpoints for WordPress isFront pages attribute
sections.installation:
This plugin requires having WP API installed and activated or it won’t be of any use.

Install the plugin as you would with any WordPress plugin in your wp-content/plugins/ directory or equivalent.

Once installed, activate WP API isFront from WordPress plugins dashboard page and you’re ready to go, WP API will respond with new endpoints.
sections.faq:
Is this an official extension of WP API?

There’s no such thing.

Will this plugin do ‘X’ ?

You can submit a pull request to: https://github.com/oleg2tor/wp-rest-api-is-front
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Add: Check for WP REST API Plugin is activated

1.0.0

  • First public release

short_description: Extends WordPress WP REST API (V2) with new endpoints pointing to WordPress isFront function.
description: This plugin extends the WordPress JSON REST API with new endpoints for WordPress isFront pages attribute
